text: György Balázs and Dudi Sela were the defending champions, but did not compete in the Juniors in this year. Pablo Andújar and Marcel Granollers won in the final 6–3, 6–2 against Alex Kuznetsov and Mischa Zverev. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== Boys' Doubles French Open, 2004 Boys' Doubles
title: 2004 French Open – Boys' Doubles
